page.title: 14Gravel Pit Development
page.content: One day,we went for a walk by the River Medway.On our walk we saw some men and they said they were going to dig a gravel pit.They said they were going to build a road from Hadlow Stair to cross the Medway.The road is now under construction.They will be building two bridges;one over the Medway and one over a dyke.Here they will dig a gravel pit and extract gravel. I think the area now is nice and unspoilt.I do not like the idea of digging a gravel pit because it will spoil the area.I hope that when they have finished extracting the gravel they will fill the pit in and leave the area nice and unspoilt once again.
